title: 服务器自动重启！
author: 温馨の小镇
txt_content:
[15:54:11] [Server thread/WARN]: MOD HAS DIRECT REFERENCE System.exit() THIS IS NOT ALLOWED REROUTING TO FML!
[15:54:11] [Server thread/WARN]: Offendor: net/md_5/specialsource/SpecialSource.main([Ljava/lang/String;)V
[15:54:11] [Server thread/WARN]: Use FMLCommonHandler.exitJava instead

replies.author: 温馨の小镇
replies.txt_content:
[15:54:18] [Server thread/WARN]: iConomy - If you are using Flatfile storage be aware that versions 6, 7 and 8 have a CRITICAL bug which can wipe ALL iconomy data.
[15:54:18] [Server thread/WARN]: if you're using Votifier, or any other plugin which handles economy data in a threaded manner your server is at risk!
[15:54:18] [Server thread/WARN]: it is highly suggested to use SQL with iCo6 or to use an alternative economy plugin!
